Title: Let's Boogie
Plot: In this episode, we explore all sorts of dances. We learn that all sorts of movements can qualify as a dance. In the Blue Skidoo segment, we find out that a person who works to create dances is called a choreographer. We help Steve and Blue to aid the choreographer in performing a new dance of his.
GuestStars: Chase Browndorf, Cole Browndorf, D'anndra D. Le Blanc, Alexander Mason, Veronica McCarthy, Taylor Racevius, Kayla Rodrigues, Dylan Vallarta
